DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study show immediate effect myofascial induction perceive pain anxiety , cervical/shoulder range motion mood state breast cancer survivor suffer shoulder/arm morbidity .
DOC.detailed_description: Background : To investigate immediate effect myofascial induction perceive pain anxiety , cervical/shoulder range motion mood state breast cancer survivor suffer shoulder/arm morbidity . Methods : Randomized , single-blind , placebo-controlled cross-over study . Twenty-one enrolled participant diagnosis breast cancer stage I-IIIA complete adjuvant therapy except hormonal treatment . The study consist two intervention session 30 minute separate wash-up period 4 week . The intervention consist Myofascial Induction ( experimental group ) placebo pulse shortwave therapy ( control group ) . The main outcome measure : Visual Analogue Scale pain anxiety , shoulder-cervical goniometry range motion , Profile Mood States psychological distress Attitudes Toward Massage Scale .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis breast cancer ( cancer stage IIIIA ) age 25 65 complete adjuvant therapy except hormonal treatment cancer recurrence
